channel.title: Event Gallery on AAi Hugo Demo
channel.description: Recent content in Event Gallery on AAi Hugo Demo

item.title: Annual Food Drive 2024
item.description:
Annual Food Drive 2024

Our community came together in an incredible way for this year’s Annual Food Drive. We set a goal to collect 3,000 lbs of food, and we smashed it by collecting over 5,000 lbs!

Volunteers from all walks of life spent the day sorting, packing, and distributing food to local families in need.

Highlights

  • 500+ Families served
  • 150 Volunteers participated
  • $2,000 Raised in additional donations

Thank you to everyone who made this possible!

item.title: Community Garden Planting
item.description:
Community Garden Planting

To celebrate Earth Day, we launched our new Community Garden project. Neighbors joined hands to plant vegetables, herbs, and flowers that will provide fresh produce to the community center kitchen.

It was a beautiful day of sunshine, soil, and smiles.

What We Planted

  • Tomatoes
  • Peppers
  • Zucchini
  • Basil & Cilantro
  • Sunflowers

We can’t wait to see the garden grow!

item.title: Youth Mentorship Kickoff
item.description:
Youth Mentorship Kickoff

We are thrilled to announce the launch of our Youth Mentorship Program. This event brought together 30 energetic youths and 30 dedicated professionals ready to guide them.

The evening was filled with icebreaker activities, inspiring speeches, and the beginning of life-long connections.

Program Goals

  1. Career guidance
  2. Personal development
  3. Networking opportunities

Here’s to a bright future for our leaders of tomorrow!
